trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Sonoma
There were no other sightings in Sonoma on or around February 14th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsJust outside noticed a bright star--- about as bright and size of Sirius---it then moved as in traveling. At first I thought I was "dizzy" but it actually moved! The star traveled from south west to north east in an arc and as it moved farther away it dimmed until I could no longer see it. Aprox 45 seconds from the time I noticed it until it had dimmed. Perhaps falling space debris? Very strange---would love to know if anyone else in the northern Ca area of Sonoma saw this as well!
